newsitem.title: USA: Johnson Worldwide buys kayak maker.
newsitem.headline: Johnson Worldwide buys kayak maker.

text.p: Johnson Worldwide Associates Inc, which makes diving, fishing and camping equipment, said Tuesday it acquired Ocean Kayak Inc, a Ferndale Wash.-based manufacturer of sit-on-top kayaks.
Terms of the transaction were not disclosed.
Ocean Kayak's revenues in 1996 totaled $5.7 million.
The acquisition will give Johnson Worldwide canoe and kayak manufacturing capability on the West Coast.
